tokens.name: Blake's Offshore Account Statement
tokens.fullDescription: Bank statement from Cayman Islands showing $2.3M deposit on October 15th. Account holder listed as 'Blackwood Holdings LLC'. Routing numbers trace to shell company in Delaware.
tokens.playerInteraction: Players discovered this after tracing Blake's financial trail through Charlie's audit reports

tokens.name: Charlie's Audit Report
tokens.fullDescription: Internal audit document showing irregular entries from October. Charlie's notes indicate he was asked to 'adjust' the numbers.
tokens.playerInteraction: Elena photographed this document, exposing Charlie's involvement

paperEvidence.name: Offshore Account Statement
paperEvidence.description: Bank statement from Cayman Islands showing $2.3M deposit on October 15th.
paperEvidence.quotableContent: Transfer authorized by B.M., countersigned C.D.

paperEvidence.name: Internal Email Thread
paperEvidence.description: Printed email chain between Blake and Charlie discussing 'the arrangement' and 'cleaning up the trail'.
paperEvidence.quotableContent: We need to clean this up before the quarterly review. - B

transactions.inference: Shell company with no real operations - funds likely redirected to personal accounts
Equipment vendor doesn't exist - invoice fabricated

relationships.connection: Blake and Charlie attended same university
relationships.inference: Long-standing relationship enabled trust for the scheme

keyDates.event: Blake accessed secure file room at 2:15 AM

accusation.reasoning: Group traced the money trail through their connected accounts

curatorNotes.layerRationale: Evidence categorized by player discovery pattern - exposed items were actively investigated, buried items require inference
